decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to apply aggressive pressure on the opponent by utilizing a combination of disruptive cards and efficient creatures. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Dauthi Voidwalker while also putting pressure on the opponent's life total with powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer. The inclusion of cards like Blood Moon and Feign Death add an additional layer of disruption and trickery to gain an advantage. Overall, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through aggressive plays and disruption.

The key concept of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive strategy by leveraging the power of human creatures. The deck aims to swarm the board with a combination of efficient creatures like Thalia's Lieutenant, Champion of the Parish, and Reflector Mage, along with disruptive elements like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Lavinia, Azorius Renegade. Aether Vial helps to cheat creatures into play, while Noble Hierarch provides additional mana acceleration. The inclusion of Anointed Peacekeeper and Coppercoat Vanguard offers protection against opposing aggression. The mana base of the deck is optimized to maximize the consistency of casting human creatures.
